metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7589 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A double free in load_bmp in CImg.hoccurs when loading a crafted bmp image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7589` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cimg-examples - 2.4.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cimg package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.5+dfsg-1').
